name: Kingmaker (itch) (Yrgo_Game_Creator, Emil Carlsson, ManEatingCrocodile, Hinalina, Karl Thorsman, KvartzC)
name_original: Kingmaker (itch) (Yrgo_Game_Creator, Emil Carlsson, ManEatingCrocodile, Hinalina, Karl Thorsman, KvartzC)
description:
Kingmaker is a 4-player local versus game, with the unique twist that you must upgrade your opponents between each round.

UPGRADE YOUR FOES

After each round, you must choose between a set of upgrades to give out to your opponents. 

Trade upgrades with your friends, or maybe band together against the currently leading player?

4 PLAYER MAYHEM

Play with 2-4 friends locally!

OUTSMART YOUR FRIENDS ENEMIES

Help or sabotage for your friends, the first one to 3 wins is KING 

HOW TO PLAY

Just download the game, unzip the folder and start the Kingmaker.exe file!
